thread.title: Beth Herrington Joins Woodforest National Bank As Senior Vice President - Middle Market Relationship Manager

author: cnbc.com
title: Beth Herrington Joins Woodforest National Bank As Senior Vice President - Middle Market Relationship Manager
text:
THE WOODLANDS, Texas, March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Woodforest National Bank recently named Beth Herrington as Senior Vice President and Middle Market Relationship Manager based in Charlotte. Herrington is a middle market banking executive with 20 years of broad financial services experience in the Carolinas, including senior debt capital solutions, equity sponsored transactions, international banking, and strategic advising.
Her role will be focused on expanding and developing Woodforest's corporate and middle market banking presence in the Carolinas and beyond. "I chose Woodforest because the bank has a philosophy that I believe in," Herrington said. "I strive to have a reputation for identifying unmet needs and targeting effective and efficient solutions delivered with a white-glove experience."
Herrington holds a B.S. in Business Administration from the University of North Carolina, Charlotte along with an MBA from Appalachian State University. She has spent her 20 years of experience working for PNC Bank, First Charter Bank, and Wachovia Bank. She has a proven track record as a trusted advisor to middle-market firms with annual revenues up to $1 billion.
Bill Peele, Regional President of Woodforest National Bank, said Herrington's seasoned expertise would help move the bottom line for Woodforest's clients. "Beth is a key hire," Peele said. "She partners with client leadership teams in developing creative capital options and establishing cash flow optimization strategies. Her thought leadership offers her clients a differentiated experience and insights that help them accelerate their strategic objectives."
A native Charlottean, Herrington is committed to the local community. She recently completed tenures as the Board President for the Metropolitan Business Professional Women Organization and the Board of Directors for the Community School of the Arts. Beth currently serves on the UNC Charlotte Graduate School Advisory Board.
About Woodforest
Celebrating 37 years of community banking service, Woodforest National Bank has successfully stood among the strongest community banks in the nation, proudly offering unsurpassed quality customer service since 1980. Woodforest currently operates over 700 branches in 17 states across the United States. For more information about Woodforest National Bank please visit www.woodforest.com .
